CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 23, 1951, pg. 20, reads: "Papa's Pride and Joy - Baby Joyce Ann Broadus, pictured right, snuggles close in her dad's arms as she receives the prize for being the most popular baby. The cash gift was presented by Mrs. Lena Hughes.  Other infants are, left to right: Romaine Childs, second-prize winner, and Crystal Rowe [?] prize winner.  The babies are all cuddled [?] comfortably in their parents' arms.  The [?]... was held Sunday in Nazarene Church. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women, men, and babies, including from left: Mr. Childs holding Romaine Childs, woman holding baby Crystal, and Mr. Broadus holding Joyce Ann Broadus, for popular baby contest in church, another version
